titles.title: Be high and lifted up, Hallelujah

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be high and lifted up
Be high and lifted up
Be high and lifted up, Jesus
It's You we glorify
It's You we're lifting high
Your name be glorified

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah
You are worthy of our praise
